editor.dropHint: Drag blocks here or click to add

editor.noConfigOptions: No configuration options for this block

messages.cycleDetected: Infinite loop detected. Please check connections

copilot.chatHint: Get help with step configuration and workflow building

copilot.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

copilot.workflowGenerated: Workflow generated. It will be applied to the canvas.

errors.networkError: Failed to connect to server. Please check your network connection.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.

agent.placeholder: Describe the features or requirements to add...

trigger.title: Select trigger type

errors.timeoutHint: Please wait a moment and try again

errors.unknownHint: If the problem persists, please contact support

wait.title: Wait Configuration
wait.durationHint: Time to wait in milliseconds (max 1 hour)

function.title: Function Configuration

router.title: Router Configuration
router.classificationPromptPlaceholder: Based on the input, classify which route...

humanInLoop.title: Human in Loop Configuration
humanInLoop.testModeNote: In test mode, this step will auto-approve. In production, it will wait for human input.

join.title: Join Configuration
join.description: Join step merges outputs from multiple branches. No additional configuration needed.

start.title: Start Configuration
start.description: This is the entry point for your workflow. All execution begins from this step and flows through connected nodes.
start.cannotDelete: Start nodes cannot be deleted. Every workflow must have an entry point.

outputSchema.title: Output Schema (Defined)
outputSchema.description: Output fields that will be passed to the next step.
outputSchema.note: Fields not defined in the schema will not be passed to the next step.

availableVariables.title: Available Input Variables
availableVariables.description: Variables available for use in templates. Reference them using double curly braces.

filter.title: Filter Configuration
filter.expressionHint: Items matching this condition will pass through
filter.keepAllHint: If true, keeps or removes all items based on single evaluation

split.title: Split Configuration
split.batchSizeHint: Number of items per batch (1 = process one at a time)

note.title: Note Configuration
note.contentPlaceholder: Add documentation or comments about this part of the workflow...
note.description: Notes are for documentation only and do not affect workflow execution.

log.title: Log Configuration
log.messageHint: Use {'{{'}$.field{'}}'} template variables in your message
log.viewNote: Log output can be viewed in the step output on the Run details page

flow.title: Flow
flow.selectStepHint: Select a step to configure its output ports, scripts, and error handling

prescript.title: Pre-script
prescript.description: Code executed before the step runs
prescript.codePlaceholder:
// Transform input data before step execution
return input;

postscript.title: Post-script
postscript.description: Code executed after the step completes
postscript.codePlaceholder:
// Transform output data after step execution
return output;

onError.title: On Error Action
onError.fallbackDesc: Return a fallback value or route to error port
onError.enableErrorPortDesc: Route error to the 'error' output port instead of using a static fallback value

flow.phase2Note: Error handling configuration will be available in a future update
flow.phase3Note: Script configuration will be available in a future update

inheritance.title: Inheritance Settings

inheritance.configDefaultsHint: Default values merged with parent block config
inheritance.preProcessPlaceholder:
// Executed before parent block code
input.timestamp = Date.now();
inheritance.preProcessHint: JavaScript code executed before parent block code

// Executed after parent block code
result.processed = true;

test.title: Test Execution
test.info: This is a mock test. Integration with backend API is required for actual execution.

process.title: Process Hooks
process.preProcessHelp: Pre-Process code is executed before parent block code. You can transform inputs or add processing.
process.postProcessHelp: Post-Process code is executed after parent block code. You can transform outputs or add processing.

enabled.label: Enable Trigger
enabled.description: When enabled, this trigger will automatically execute

type.label: Trigger Type
type.manualDesc: Start execution manually. Can be triggered from the Run page or test execution.
type.webhookDesc: Start execution via HTTP request from external systems.
type.scheduleDesc: Start execution periodically based on a cron expression.
type.slackDesc: Start execution on Slack events (messages, reactions, etc.).

webhook.secretHint: Secret key used to verify webhook requests
webhook.inputMappingHint: JSON path from request body to workflow input
webhook.allowedIpsHint: Comma-separated IP addresses or CIDRs (empty = allow all)

email.inputMappingHint: Mapping from email data to workflow input
